channel.title: How contributions are handled on PrestaShop Developer Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in How contributions are handled on PrestaShop Developer Documentation

item.title: How Pull Requests are processed
item.description: How Pull Requests are processedAll submitted pull requests go through a thorough process which aims to provide a stable, consistent and reliable software that we all know under the name PrestaShop. Here is this process in details. Automatic tasks when you open a Pull RequestWhen you submit a new Pull Request to the project repository, some automatic checks are triggered. Continuous IntegrationThe project relies on GitHub Action to perform multiple checks against submitted Pull Requests.
